title: BRIEF-Suntech receives order from Alcatel-Lucent Polska
text:
BRIEF-Suntech receives order from Alcatel-Lucent Polska 
Oct 5 Suntech SA : 
* Receives order from Alcatel-Lucent Polska Sp. z o.o. for delivery of SunVizion CRM system under Broadband Network for Eastern Poland - Swietokrzyskie Region Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom) Trending On Reuters
